title: How to Make Pancakes Using Baby Cereal

steps.headline: Make the batter.
steps.description: Combine the formula/milk, banana, eggs, baby cereals, and apple juice/water in a bowl.

steps.headline: Add the flour to the bowl.
steps.description: You may want to sift a little in, incorporate it, and add additional flour. Keep doing this until everything is mixed in, but don't over mix the batter.

steps.headline: Use the butter in a medium sized skillet on medium heat.
Pour small circles of batter in the skillet.
steps.description: Allow it to cook and flip when you see bubbles forming. Both sides should be evenly light brown in color.

text: Make the batter. Combine the formula/milk, banana, eggs, baby cereals, and apple juice/water in a bowl. Add the flour to the bowl. You may want to sift a little in, incorporate it, and add additional flour. Keep doing this until everything is mixed in, but don't over mix the batter. Use the butter in a medium sized skillet on medium heat.  Pour small circles of batter in the skillet. Allow it to cook and flip when you see bubbles forming. Both sides should be evenly light brown in color. Garnish the pancakes with fruit.
